dmca.title: PiracyBuster Copyright Complaint
dmca.body:
Our investigation shows that you are providing Internet access and/or links to and/or 
hosting the following material:

Carnage
    http://shareflare.net/download/31579.3e8f6102e8a01d31887c705dc76b/Carnage.2011.R5.READNFO.XviD.HebSub-Topdown.me.avi.html

The Double
    http://shareflare.net/download/79214.735d88201bb92c8aaef55fb485fc/The.Double.2011.BDRip.XviD-SPRiNTER.HebSubbed-TopDown.me.avi.html


Which enable downloads and/or online watch of copyrighted motion picture(s).

Your actions constitute, among others, copyrights and other rights infringements, 
Which are punishable by both the Criminal (and can result by a punishment of 5 years 
in jail + up to 1.5 million ILS fine) and Civil code (which can result in compensation 
of up to 100,000 ILS for every such infringement, without any proof of  specific damage).

We request that you immediately do all the following:

- Disable access to this page or Link;
- Remove this file from your server; and
- Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms 
of Service Agreement.
dmca.principal_name: The Cinema Industry Association in Israel
